column1: Smoque BBQ////I'm not a huge BBQ lover
column2: but I like this place a LOT and get regular cravings. The ribs are really good - their Baby Back ribs are tastier than the St. Louis
column3: but the St. Louis has more meat (so more bang for your buck). They both have an amazing smoky flavor that I love
column5: but the meat is not as tender and juicy as I would expect. The Macaroni&Cheese side is creamy n'delicious and I think the Peach Cobbler is the only dessert they have
column6: but it's the only one you need
